# Get Page Post Insights

# Description

Retreive the page post insights.

# Project compatibility

Windows | Cross-platform

# Configuration

* 
* Page - Select the page from the drop-down list. This field supports String type input.
* Metrics - Enter the page metrics to retreive. The following category of metrics will be defaulted: Page Posts, Page Post Impressions, Page Post Engagement and Page Post Reactions. This field supports String type input.









* Page post insights - Automatically generated output variable.
